=====
Setup
=====

Dependencies
============

System packages (install with apt-get):

.. code-block:: bash

   python-tk

Python packages:

.. code-block:: bash

   numpy
   h5py
   matplotlib
   pyresample
   netCDF4
   scipy

Easiest way to install the dependencies is to:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -r ./codeshop/compute_sic/requirements.txt
